pages.text: $(li)The Tripwire Hook is a placeable block that is capable of detect players, creatures, or even items.$(br)$(li)First you need to place two Tripwire Hook lined up.

$(li)Now just right click on them while you are holding String on your hand.$(br)$(li)Now if any creature touch the almost invisible string, the Tripwire Hook will emit a redstone signal pulse.$(br)$(li)This item can be used to craft a Trapped Chest in a Crafting Table.$(br)$(li)Fletchers will exchange a Tripwire Hook by Emeralds.
